item.title: Using Python to obtain data from Reddit
item.description: Introduction As of March 2022, Reddit ranks as the 9th-most-visited website in the world and 6th most-visited website in the US according to Wikipedia. What is interesting about Reddit is that it has subreddits for people with different interests. For example, there are subreddits on prorgramming, technology or even about funny things at funny. There are a few approaches one can take to obtain data from Reddit. Here is one way to do it.
